name: Werewolf House: The Curse of the Reverse Werewolf
name_original: Werewolf House: The Curse of the Reverse Werewolf
description:
Yes that's right it's the game that is all about wolf biting but this time you are a reverse werewolf, meaning you transform into anything you bite. Also instead of a fierce, powerful werewolf you are dumb as hell, which is the reverse of that.

Runs way smoother if you open it up in a new window rather than a tab! Not sure why that is! I don't know shit!

It's buggy as hell but this is the best I can do and also the bugs are on purpose as a joke. Still very much in development but it would be a shame to not put my wellbeing at risk to get it out by Halloween wouldn't it?
